sent.orig: She meant the saloon; the proprietor also had rooms for rent upstairs.
sent.trans: 她指的是酒店，老板在楼上也有空房间出租。

sent.orig: Carrying the bags upstairs is half the battle. Then we only have to unpack them.
sent.trans: 把袋子搬上楼就做了一大半工作，后面的事只需把袋子打开，取出里面的东西就行了。

sent.orig: The bottom for the three-hole doors, for people within the brick stairs upstairs.
sent.trans: 底层为三孔木门，内有砖砌台阶供人上楼。

sent.orig: Polly: Go upstairs and clean up right away.
sent.trans: 宝利：上楼去马上收拾干净。

sent.orig: He went upstairs to put on his slippersDhis elegant slippers of seal-brown, shaped like medieval shoes.
sent.trans: 他上楼去换了拖鞋――一双黄褐色、中世纪式样的漂亮的拖鞋。
